name: The Grand Heist
description:
Grand Heist is the engaging game that allows you to be part of thief team in 1930 is.
Action packed strategy with an interactive environment.
Every mission can give you custom objectives



Smart Enemy can track you down if you forgot something.
Lots of unique character abilities. Unique tools. They can affect everything around you.
you chose how to complete each mission
Hiding and yourself or hiding bodies – your decision.
Brake glass to make the noise or scream to get the guards attention.

.

Explore new levels and replay the old ones with a different approach and mission.
Seek and find the most interesting treasures at the time, the
Be Quick, need to change locations to make sure you are not getting caught.
Be careful of the NPC – if they spot you, hey can easily catch you, one single trigger of alarm can make you end the level.

.

Use your trick to be able to go through the level. Either by knocking out the guards or tricking them by using your special abilities.
If you Decide to carry on brute force, remember to clean up the bodies after each attack – they are not stupid, dead body means you turned off the alarm



Various objectives located on 10 levels, all of the levels got re-playability at different scenarios.
Steal to gather the currency and spend it for a variety of improvements to the characters and in particular their abilities.
unlock unique content.
